metadata.synopsis: One liner of a haunted painting in the atelier of Jannath Estate  that will say some insult with the voice of Kerri Evenfield, the ghost that is haunting the whole mansion.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_BringOskarHomego to CTY_Main_A -262; 39; -48Interact with portrait in that position.

0.text: (It burns. It burns. You will burn too.)
